channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: As the shutdown drags on, these people will lose if health care subsidies expire
item.description: Millions of Americans with Affordable Care Act marketplace health insurance will face higher costs next year if Congress doesn’t extend enhanced premium tax credits that have made the plans more affordable.

item.title: Who’s winning the blame game over the shutdown? Here’s what a new AP-NORC poll shows
Alaska works to evacuate storm victims by helicopter and plane in historic airlift
